author: A Google User
comment: It is worth. I use Phone Weaver with Call Weaver for maximum advantages.The proof of pudding is in its eating. Please make possible to enter coordinates for locations. Stable, reliable and trouble free. Location function is more versatile in Easy Profile Pro. I tried most of the other paid similar applications, and found Phone Weaver to be practically useful in every day life. You may also try similar ones- Actions Pro for example. PLEASE ADD MOTION DETECTION TRIGGER with Time delay.
title: I liked It.  Please add..

author: Dave Fenichel
comment: Phone Weaver was the first and, for a long time, only app I purchased for Android. I liked the using the calendar sync ("Agenda") to mute/unmute when I was in meetings, and especially the app's ability to turn on wifi when I arrive home - and off when I leave, to save battery. It lost the ability to access any of my location services, and Smart Actions, as awful as it is, seems to work more reliably for the things that it does. I sent an email to Sesma support, and the person who responded seemed to be trying to tell me how to turn GPS on, in my device; provided no other options. (I know how to turn on all my location services.) If location access is restored this will get 5 stars.

author: A Google User
comment: I've been using this app for a few years.  In the beginning it was good, but lately it's unreliable.  In particular, honoring the priority of my profiles such that a Bluetooth connection profile should always override the default Day profile doesn't always work.  I'm going to look for a new app.
title: Tired of the inconsistency

author: Brutus Capoeira
comment: Used to be good... Now it's just plain unstable...  I love this app. I've had since Samsung Note first appeared on the market. I've always kept it installed as I upgraded phones. It worked great on my Nexus 4 and Nexus 5 but recently on my Nexus 6 and recent Android updates it's lost its stability.  The phone basically locks up when switching to navigation when I'm in my car. Instead of making it easy for me to answer calls, view my maps and send and receive text via voice commands it pretty much becomes inoperable. I have to reboot, disable the app, set my screen timeout to the max... all while driving to my destination.  Sorry Phone Weaver but I had to uninstall you. Unless they fix the app I'll have to look for an alternative. :(

author: A Google User
comment: Everything you could ask for is already built-in. Seems that support has ended, which is a shame. Great app! Consistently works, where others do not. Lightweight, easy on battery, but best of all you set it and forget it. It always works!
title: A must have for me

author: Stephen Wolf
comment: While this used to be the best, there have been no updates in over a year and it has become unstable. Profiles not switching correctly, rules not being followed and not backing up fully. Email just sent to dev, but I'm not expecting a response.
title: The best profile manager

author: Khun Otto
comment: System Volume does not switch back to "All" when changing from night to day, stays on "priority". It only changes back to "All" when swichting by hand!  Any help would be appreciated  Nexus 4 and 7 2013, both on Android 5.1.1 stock rooted

author: Jo Mitchell
comment: Worked great until the android upgrade. Now it no longer manages the data connections, phone sounds or notification sounds. Upgrade needed ASAP !!!
title: Not lollipop compatible

author: Eric Perret
comment: I bought it because it can change my phone from ringer to vibrate based on location (at work).  Unfortunatly it cause my entire phone to slow down and become unusable.  Major performance problems on Android 2.3.4 .  First and last time I buy something from the Play store.

author: John Bowden
comment: ...now crashes ever time I try to add a wallpaper to a profile.  On Samsung Galaxy Note 5.  No response from developer, no updates since 2015.  No longer recommended
title: No longer recommended

author: Darren Archer
comment: If you need profiles this is it. I've used this for the last 5 phones from HTC, Samsung and now LGG3 easy to use and set up and create new profiles. Couldn't go to work and know my phone won't go off I'm high profile meetings is priceless.
title: The best profile manager

author: Paul
comment: Ive used this app for years and lately its become crap, most days it doesnt switch profiles between day and night  cant believe such a good app is now ruined.
title: Time to uninstall

author: Levu Work
comment: SinceTouchDown updated, it does not recognize my TouchDown appointments. This happens on my S6 Edge and also S5 mini. Please fix this!!!

author: John Smith
comment: No longer working . I hope the developers will fix this or give money back  JUNK
title: Not Working

author: Kimberly L. Thompson
comment: Awesome app. Doesn't allow data control but since lollipop update, no profile manager app does (unless device is rooted).
title: Awesome...

author: Jeff Starkey
comment: I have had this app on every mobile device I have owned. It's a must have for any Android user IMO. Awesome app,  awesome devs, and awesome support. Keep it up.

author: RIZEA RADU EUGEN
comment: I buy this application for autoanswer option but not working. I have HTC one max android 5.01, HTC one m8 android 6.0 and HTC 10 android 6.0. All this autoanswer not working.
title: Autoanswer not working!

author: Madadh Sweeney
comment: Since the update a month ago this app no longer functions and it screws my phone up. Uninstalling.
title: Was great

author: James Bassett
comment: Can't believe everyone doesn't use a profile manager. For those that have seen the light, this is it.
title: Essential

author: Fresh Message
comment: Samsung note 4, It stopes working offline please update

author: A Google User
comment: Been using this app since my Droid one.  thanks for resurrecting!
title: My favorite app!

author: Richard
comment: Great on Nexus 6P

author: Jason Kench
comment: Brilliant

author: A Google User
comment: Sort of working but hangup calls doesn't work on HTC One m8. Have to set the mate option.
title: Needs work

author: Samantha Eason
comment: This worked brilliantly on my S4 but the phone has rung twice now in meetings on my S5 while it's in 'agenda' profile and supposed to be silent so I can't rely on it any more :(
title: Not working

author: Stelios Stylianou
comment: I have been using this from day one on android. Since version 3 it will not set my LG G2 KitKat rooted phone to FlightMode
title: No Flight Mode

author: A Google User
comment: Have used this app for years,  now no widgets available for my LG G3.
title: What happened to the widgets?

author: Charles Linkison
comment: Been using this for ages, it used to turn data off at night between certain hours. On lollipop this has stopped working, it no longer turns off data at those times...is it just me ?
title: Used to turn data off at night...

author: Robert Brydia
comment: Sesma worked hard to find the problem and resolve it.  Tech support was great and responsive.  Very happy with the product.
title: Last update appears to be problematic

author: Thomas Kus
comment: I have used this for about 3 years now and wouldn't want to be without it anymore.
title: Love it

author: Jesse G.
comment: Nice for a busy person.  No need to remember each setting. A little time consuming to set up, but I like all the options. 11/17/14 UPDATE: Just updated, will check back to see if the update keeps me happy. 1/17/15 update,  everything except Automatic triggering is working.  Won't change at set times in Android 5.01
title: Perfecct

author: anon nymous
comment: Ever since code re-write logic is broken. Cannot perform what it is supposed to do - determine your location. Only works if WiFi PERMANENTLY left on. Very very disappointed. Have been using for years until author tried to fix when its not broken. Forced to uninstall and use alternative free apps which work better. Latest update still needs WiFi and will turn it on momentarily but still does not work.

reply.author: Sesma Europe
reply.content: Maybe your profile modifies what is necessary to be located?

title: No longer works without WiFi

author: A Google User
comment: Love it.  Set locations based on: gps, cell tower, wifi network....;set functions:  ringers, volume, alerts, wifi status, gps on/off, lock screen, lock delay, you name it.  Have a work phone and home phone all in one. Turn sound profiles up and down based on time, day of week, calendar entries...  have used to keep late night email and text from waking me, but still able to get phone calls and switches back every morning. SgNote3
title: Location based profiels

author: Mark Smith
comment: Since the last two updates the 2x2 or big and resizeable widget doesn't display properly on my home screen. The profile text and reset icon are too far left so a section of both is hidden. It's also a disappointing shade of grey, which I can't see a config setting to change.
title: Bad layout on 2x2 widget

author: mitesh mehta
comment: App working well with time trigger on samsung note 4.need nfc trigger built in the app. Tried the nfc plugin but it is not doing anything even though I am rooted.
title: Need Nfc trigger

author: MARK L
comment: I've been using this and CallWeaver for well over 2 years now and its by far the best and easiest to use
title: The only profile scheduler out there that actually works

author: Vin Daniell
comment: If I switch from a profile that doesn't vibrate to my main profile the phone won't vibrate and ring at the same time.  However this does work if switching from a profile that vibrates. Galaxy note 3. Licensed user.
title: Doesnt vibrate while ringing

author: Rana R
comment: Widget now takes up 2 rows! Icons are too big... only 4 icons fit on the screen. The refresh button is too big. You need to change the profile icons. Very old graphics! Make new flat icons.
title: Widget too big! Make new icons!

author: alejandro cesar moreno vera
comment: I paid for it.....doesn t work, can't change location(gps) mobile data traffic and airplane mode.on samsung S3  S4 and S5 and experia Z1

reply.author: Sesma Europe
reply.content: This is only that only rooted users can do. Google limitations, sorry :(

author: Armen Hakobyan
comment: Don't turn on airplan mode, when must do it, on change the profile...
